title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year-over-year visitor growth, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Year-over-year visitor growth has decreased over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, roughly increasing from 2019 to 2021, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020 and 2021.
Max Year-over-year visitor growth about 6.1 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Year-over-year visitor growth about 3.3 was recorded at Year 2020
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year-over-year visitor growth, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2018 to 2020.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2021 to 2022.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2020 to 2021.
